thread.title: Local News: Love brewed in a newsroom: Media couple Dennis Okari and Betty Kyallo tie the knot
thread.title_full: Local News: Love brewed in a newsroom: Media couple Dennis Okari and Betty Kyallo tie the knot

title: Local News: Love brewed in a newsroom: Media couple Dennis Okari and Betty Kyallo tie the knot
text:
By May Jesaro Saturday, Oct 3rd 2015 at 08:33 
By May Jesaro ( @KiptuiMay ) and Sarah Okuoro (@AshaFox_) 
After six years of dating, experiencing an epic love story, lovebirds Dennis Okari and Betty Kyallo are set to tied the knot on 2 nd October. 
The couple said ‘I Do’ to each other at an invite only event. The invite showed the couple staring at each other in an outdoor setting with the caption Love Happens! 
Their love was brewed at Kenya Television Network where they were both chasing their dream in the media industry. Dennis then moved and joined NTV while Betty moved up to become news anchor at KTN. 
They have a 1-year-old daughter called Ivanna. 
The two join the list of media personalities to tie the knot in 2015 among them Janet Mbugua, Mark Maasai, Obadiah Kendagor and Hussein Mohamed.
